name: Super Mario and the Lizard Invasion
name_original: Super Mario and the Lizard Invasion
description:
WOW! This is my new finest fangame that was called Super Mario and the Lizard Invasion.

Super Mario and the Lizard Invasion was powered by Super Mario Fusion Revival, Mushroom Kingdom Fusion and Mario Mania.

Super Mario and the Lizard Invasion was based on Super Mario Galaxy, Super Mario Galaxy 2 and Jazz Jackrabbit GBA.
